LTHM Loup Ventures founder Gene Munster 652019 My sense is that this is an arms supplier to the arms race of batteries Munster said In the nearterm he said concerns over the trade war could continue to weigh on Livent but in the longerterm the stock is a unique opportunity to invest in a US lithium play with measurable upside
